c1.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
c1.descriptionRaw:
When <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color> is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.
c1.description:
When Stormbreaker is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

c2.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
c2.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color>'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.
c2.description: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

c3.name: Summoner of Storm
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Tidecaller</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Stunning Revenge
c4.descriptionRaw: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> for 10s.
c4.description: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% Electro DMG for 10s.

c5.name: Crimson Tidewalker
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Bane of Evil
c6.descriptionRaw: During the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Stormbreaker</color>, the <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro RES</color> of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.
c6.description: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.
